name: AI's War
description:
It's a text adventure game. It's pretty basic, but it's my first "game" so I think it's okay.

It was made following the udemy course: "Complete C# Unity Developer 2D: Learn to Code Making Games"

I would love to receive some feedback. Enjoy the game!

(My english is not that good yet, so sorry for any mistakes you may find, let me knowing if you do. Thanks very much!)
